marker.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an object, sign etc that shows the position of something
marker.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He buried the bodies in a single grave with a wooden cross as a marker.
marker.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something which shows that a quality or feature exists or is present
marker.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: antibodies which are a marker of hepatitis
the use of slang as a marker of social identity
marker.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a large pen with a thick point made of felt, used for marking or drawing things
